# **A brief history of Richard**  
### *Early years*  
Born in [Preston, Lancashire](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Preston,_Lancashire) to a Barrister (Father) and a solicitor (Mother), I have 2 brothers named Alex and Nicholas. During my early years, I  played football and Rugby and was a national chess champion.
